Method.name: GetTranscrList
Method.Description: Description: 获取转抄科室和转抄人 Creator: lvpeng CreateDate: 20180503 Table: DHC_MedAdrRepAuditItm Input: 审核表ID Output: Others: w ##class(web.DHCADVSEARCHREPORT).GetTranscrList("1","35")
Method.Implementation:
N (TypeeventDr,RepID) Q:(RepID="")||(TypeeventDr="") "" S TranscrUserStr="",TranscrLocStr="" S MedadrID="" F S MedadrID=$o(^DHCMEDREPADT(0,"Pointer",TypeeventDr,RepID,MedadrID)) Q:MedadrID="" D .Q:'$D(^DHCMEDREPADT(MedadrID,"MEDADRI")) .b ;MedadrID .S ChildSub="" .F S ChildSub=$o(^DHCMEDREPADT(MedadrID,"MEDADRI",ChildSub)) Q:ChildSub="" D ..S MedadrNextUserCode=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MedadrID,"MEDADRI",ChildSub),"^",5) ..Q:MedadrNextUserCode="" ..S MedadrNextUser="",MedadrNextUserDr="" ..S:MedadrNextUserCode'="" MedadrNextUserDr=$o(^SSU("SSUSR",0,"SSUSR_Initials",$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(MedadrNextUserCode),"")) ..S:MedadrNextUserDr'="" MedadrNextUser=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",MedadrNextUserDr),"^",2) ..I TranscrUserStr="" D ...S TranscrUserStr=MedadrNextUser ..E S TranscrUserStr=TranscrUserStr_","_MedadrNextUser ..;S MedadrUser=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",MedadrUserDr),"^",2) ;^DHCMEDREPADT({DHC_MedAdrRepAudit.MEDADR_RowID},"MEDADRI",{MEDADRI_ChildSub}) ..S MedINextLocCode=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MedadrID,"MEDADRI",ChildSub),"^",4) //指向科室 ..S MedINextLoc="",MedINextLocDR="" ..S:MedINextLocCode'="" MedINextLocDR=$o(^CTLOC(0,"Code",$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(MedINextLocCode),"")) ..S:MedINextLocDR'="" MedINextLoc=$p(^CTLOC(MedINextLocDR),"^",2) ..I TranscrLocStr="" D ...S TranscrLocStr=MedINextLoc ..E S TranscrLocStr=TranscrLocStr_","_MedINextLoc
Q TranscrUserStr_"$"_TranscrLocStr

Method.name: GetMataReport
Method.Description: Description: 查询不良反应报告（所有） Creator: CongYue CreateDate: 2015-12-21 （改） Input: StrParam : 以字符"^"分割,格式为:开始时间^结束时间^科室id^病人登记号^安全组ID^科室ID^人员ID^提交状态^报告类型 Output: 报告id^报告日期^报告编码^病人登记号^病人姓名^操作人^科室描述^提交状态^报告类型^报告类型代码 Others: w ##class(web.DHCADVSEARCHREPORT).GetMataReport("40","1","2019-06-19^2019-06-26^^^117^127^7478^Y^^")
Method.Implementation:
N (rows,page,StrParam) s ^tempwml("GetMataReport")=$lb(rows,page,StrParam) S pid=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).NewPid() S EndPage=page*rows //结束行 S StPage=((page-1)*rows)+1 //开始行 S StDate=$p(StrParam,"^",1) //开始日期 S EndDate=$p(StrParam,"^",2) //结束日期 S DeptID=$p(StrParam,"^",3) //科室 S patNo=$p(StrParam,"^",4) //登记号 S GroupId=$p(StrParam,"^",5) //安全组ID S LocId=$p(StrParam,"^",6) //科室ID S UserId=$p(StrParam,"^",7) //用户ID S StatType=$p(StrParam,"^",8) //状态 S typeevent=$p(StrParam,"^",9) //填报类型 S statShare=$p(StrParam,"^",10) //分享状态 S Params=GroupId_"^"_LocId_"^"_UserId S list=UserId_"^"_LocId_"^"_GroupId ///获取授权审批状态 D ..killTmpGlobal(pid) S StDate=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateHtmlToLogical(StDate) S EndDate=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateHtmlToLogical(EndDate) S QuitFlag=0 S Num=0 F dd=StDate:1:EndDate D .S ID="" .//器械报告 .F S ID=$o(^DHCMATADRR(0,"CreateDate",dd,ID)) Q:ID="" D ..S TypeeventDr=$p(^DHCMATADRR(ID),"^",46) ..S TypeCode="",Typeevent="",statusname="",armaID="",StatusNow="" ..I TypeeventDr'="" D ...S TypeCode=$p(^DHCMEDADREVT(TypeeventDr),"^",1) ;b1 ...S Typeevent=$p(^DHCMEDADREVT(TypeeventDr),"^",2) ...s armaID=$o(^DHCADVREPMAN(0,"TyepPointer",TypeeventDr,ID,"")) //评估id 2017-06-12 ..S StatusID=$p(^DHCMATADRR(ID),"^",41) //当前状态 ;^DHCADREVTWFI({DHC_AdrEvtWorkFlow.ADREW_RowID},"ADREWI",{ADREWI_ChildSub}) ..I StatusID="" D ...S status="N" ...S statusname="未提交" ..E D ...S status="Y" ...S statusname=$p(^DHCADREVTWFI(+StatusID,"ADREWI",$p(StatusID,"||",2)),"^",2) ...s StatusNow=statusname ...S MedadrID=$o(^DHCMEDREPADT(0,"Pointer",TypeeventDr,ID,""),-1) ...I MedadrID'="" D ....S MedadrReceive=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MedadrID),"^",9) ....S MedadrReceivedesc=$S(MedadrReceive="":"",MedadrReceive="1":"接收",MedadrReceive="2":"驳回",MedadrReceive="3":"直接提交",1:"") ....I MedadrReceivedesc'="" S statusname=statusname_"："_MedadrReceivedesc //wml
..//下一状态 add by wangminglong 2019-4-23 start ..S StatusNext="" ..S AdrewRowID=$p(StatusID,"||",1) ..i AdrewRowID'="" d ...S Typeeventid=$p(^DHCADREVTWF(AdrewRowID),"^",3) ...S Listt=ID_"^"_Typeeventid_"^"_list_"^"_StatusID ...S matalist=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).InsStatusDr(Listt) ...S StatusNextID=$p(matalist,"^",2) //下一状态 ...I StatusNextID'="" D ....S AdrewRowIDn=$p(StatusNextID,"||",1) ....S AdrewChildSubn=$p(StatusNextID,"||",2) ....S StatusNext=$p(^DHCADREVTWFI(AdrewRowIDn,"ADREWI",AdrewChildSubn),"^",2) ..//下一状态 add by wangminglong 2019-4-23 end
..S quitflag=1 ..S RepNo=$p(^DHCMATADRR(ID),"^",1) //编号
..S PatNo=$p(^DHCMATADRR(ID),"^",5) //登记号 ..S PatName=$p(^DHCMATADRR(ID),"^",4) //姓名 ..S CreatorCode=$p(^DHCMATADRR(ID),"^",35) //报告人工号 ..S Creator="" ..S CreatorID="" ..I CreatorCode'="" D ...S CreatorID=$o(^SSU("SSUSR",0,"SSUSR_Initials",$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(CreatorCode),"")) ...I CreatorID'="" S Creator=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",CreatorID),"^",2) ..S LocCode=$p(^DHCMATADRR(ID),"^",36) //科室代码 ..S LocDesc="" ..S LocID="" ..I LocCode'="" D ...S LocID=$o(^CTLOC(0,"Code",LocCode,"")) ...I LocID'="" D ....S LocDesc=$p(^CTLOC(LocID),"^",2) ..S RepList=TypeeventDr_"^"_LocID_"^"_CreatorID_"^"_ID ;2016-09-29 ..S flag=..CheckQuerySec(RepList,list) ..S shareStatus="未分享" ..s rshShare="" ..i TypeeventDr'="" S rshShare=$o(^DHCADVRSH(0,"TypePointer",TypeeventDr,ID,"")) ..I rshShare'="" D ...S shareStatus="分享" ..Q:flag'=1 ..Q:(StatType'="")&(StatType'=status) ..//登录科室是品质安全部(130),医务、护理、设备、后勤保障、输血、院感、药学、企划,能查到所有不良事件 add by wangminglong 2019-7-29 start ..s LocFlag=0 ..i ((DeptID="130")||(DeptID="122")||(DeptID="127")||(DeptID="129")||(DeptID="138")||(DeptID="107")||(DeptID="128")||(DeptID="82")||(DeptID="139")) s LocFlag=1 ..Q:(LocFlag'=1)&(DeptID'="")&(DeptID'=LocID) ..//登录科室是品质安全部(130),医务、护理、设备、后勤保障、输血、院感、药学、企划,能查到所有不良事件 add by wangminglong 2019-7-29 end ..Q:(patNo'="")&(patNo'=PatNo) ..Q:(typeevent'="")&(typeevent'=TypeeventDr) ..Q:(statShare'="")&(statShare'=shareStatus) ..Q:RepNo=""
..;不良事件报告日期和时间取报告第一次提交的时间 add by wangminglong 2019-7-9 start ..;S CreateDate=$p(^DHCMATADRR(ID),"^",39) //报告 日期 ..;S CreateTime=$p(^DHCMATADRR(ID),"^",40) //报告 时间 ..s MEDADRRowID="" ..s flag="0" ..for S MEDADRRowID=$o(^DHCMEDREPADT(0,"Pointer",TypeeventDr,ID,MEDADRRowID)) q:(MEDADRRowID="")||(flag="1") d //审批明细表的id ...S StatusDR=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MEDADRRowID),"^",3) //状态 ...Q:StatusDR="" ...s flag="1" ...S CreateDate=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MEDADRRowID),"^",5) //第一次提交日期 即报告 日期 ...S CreateTime=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MEDADRRowID),"^",6) //第一次提交日期 即报告 日期 ...S:CreateDate'="" CreateDate=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateLogicalToHtml(CreateDate) ...s:CreateTime'="" CreateTime = $zt(CreateTime) ..;不良事件报告日期和时间取报告第一次提交的时间 add by wangminglong 2019-7-9 end
..S ListData=ID_"^"_CreateDate_"^"_CreateTime_"^"_RepNo_"^"_PatNo_"^"_PatName_"^"_Creator_"^"_LocDesc_"^"_statusname_"^"_Typeevent_"^"_TypeCode_"^"_shareStatus_"^"_armaID_"^^"_TypeeventDr_"^"_Typeevent_"^"_StatusNow_"^"_StatusNext .. ..S Num=Num+1 ..S ^TMP("DHCADV","web.DHCADVSEARCHREPORT","GetMataReport",pid,Num)=ListData . .//用药安全报告 .F S ID=$o(^DHCADVMEDSAR(0,"CreateDate",dd,ID)) Q:ID="" D ..S TypeeventDr=$p(^DHCADVMEDSAR(ID),"^",20) ..S TypeCode="",Typeevent="",statusname="",armaID="",StatusNow="" ..S TypeCode=$p(^DHCMEDADREVT(TypeeventDr),"^",1) ..S Typeevent=$p(^DHCMEDADREVT(TypeeventDr),"^",2) ..S:TypeeventDr'="" armaID=$o(^DHCADVREPMAN(0,"TyepPointer",TypeeventDr,ID,"")) //评估id 2017-06-12 ..S StatusID=$p(^DHCADVMEDSAR(ID),"^",18) //当前状态 ..I StatusID="" D ...S status="N" ...S statusname="未提交" ..E D ...S status="Y" ...S statusname=$p(^DHCADREVTWFI(+StatusID,"ADREWI",$p(StatusID,"||",2)),"^",2) ...S StatusNow=statusname ...S MedadrID=$o(^DHCMEDREPADT(0,"Pointer",TypeeventDr,ID,""),-1) ...I MedadrID'="" D ....S MedadrReceive=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MedadrID),"^",9) ....S MedadrReceivedesc=$S(MedadrReceive="":"",MedadrReceive="1":"接收",MedadrReceive="2":"驳回",MedadrReceive="3":"直接提交",1:"") ....I MedadrReceivedesc'="" S statusname=statusname_"："_MedadrReceivedesc //wml
..//下一状态 add by wangminglong 2019-4-23 start ..S StatusNext="" ..S AdrewRowID=$p(StatusID,"||",1) ..i AdrewRowID'="" d ...S Typeeventid=$p(^DHCADREVTWF(AdrewRowID),"^",3) ...S Listt=ID_"^"_Typeeventid_"^"_list_"^"_StatusID ...S matalist=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).InsStatusDr(Listt) ...S StatusNextID=$p(matalist,"^",2) //下一状态 ...I StatusNextID'="" D ....S AdrewRowIDn=$p(StatusNextID,"||",1) ....S AdrewChildSubn=$p(StatusNextID,"||",2) ....S StatusNext=$p(^DHCADREVTWFI(AdrewRowIDn,"ADREWI",AdrewChildSubn),"^",2) ..//下一状态 add by wangminglong 2019-4-23 end
..S quitflag=1 ..S RepNo=$p(^DHCADVMEDSAR(ID),"^",19) //编号
..S PatNo=$p(^DHCADVMEDSAR(ID),"^",8) //登记号 ..S PatName=$p(^DHCADVMEDSAR(ID),"^",9) //病人姓名 ..S CreatorCode=$p(^DHCADVMEDSAR(ID),"^",15) //报告人工号 ..S Creator="" ..I CreatorCode'="" D ...S CreatorID=$o(^SSU("SSUSR",0,"SSUSR_Initials",$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(CreatorCode),"")) ...I CreatorID'="" S Creator=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",CreatorID),"^",2) ..S LocCode=$p(^DHCADVMEDSAR(ID),"^",1) //科室代码 ..S LocDesc="" ..I LocCode'="" D ...S LocID=$o(^CTLOC(0,"Code",LocCode,"")) ...S LocDesc=$p(^CTLOC(LocID),"^",2) ..S RepList=TypeeventDr_"^"_LocID_"^"_CreatorID_"^"_ID ;2016-09-29 ..S flag=..CheckQuerySec(RepList,list)
..S shareStatus="未分享" ..S rshShare=$o(^DHCADVRSH(0,"TypePointer",TypeeventDr,ID,"")) ..I rshShare'="" D ...S shareStatus="分享"
..Q:flag'=1 ..//登录科室是品质安全部(130),医务、护理、设备、后勤保障、输血、院感、药学、企划,能查到所有不良事件 add by wangminglong 2019-7-29 start ..s LocFlag=0 ..i ((DeptID="130")||(DeptID="122")||(DeptID="127")||(DeptID="129")||(DeptID="138")||(DeptID="107")||(DeptID="128")||(DeptID="82")||(DeptID="139")) s LocFlag=1 ..Q:(LocFlag'=1)&(DeptID'="")&(DeptID'=LocID) ..//登录科室是品质安全部(130),医务、护理、设备、后勤保障、输血、院感、药学、企划,能查到所有不良事件 add by wangminglong 2019-7-29 end ..Q:(StatType'="")&(StatType'=status) .. ..Q:(patNo'="")&(patNo'=PatNo) ..Q:(typeevent'="")&(typeevent'=TypeeventDr) ..Q:(statShare'="")&(statShare'=shareStatus) ..Q:RepNo=""
..;不良事件报告日期和时间取报告第一次提交的时间 add by wangminglong 2019-7-9 start ..;S CreateDate=$p(^DHCADVMEDSAR(ID),"^",2) //报告 日期 ..;S CreateTime=$p(^DHCADVMEDSAR(ID),"^",3) //报告 时间 ..s MEDADRRowID="" ..s flag="0" ..for S MEDADRRowID=$o(^DHCMEDREPADT(0,"Pointer",TypeeventDr,ID,MEDADRRowID)) q:(MEDADRRowID="")||(flag="1") d //审批明细表的id ...S StatusDR=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MEDADRRowID),"^",3) //状态 ...Q:StatusDR="" ...s flag="1" ...S CreateDate=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MEDADRRowID),"^",5) //第一次提交日期 即报告 日期 ...S CreateTime=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MEDADRRowID),"^",6) //第一次提交日期 即报告 日期 ...S:CreateDate'="" CreateDate=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateLogicalToHtml(CreateDate) ...s:CreateTime'="" CreateTime = $zt(CreateTime) ..;不良事件报告日期和时间取报告第一次提交的时间 add by wangminglong 2019-7-9 end
..S ListData=ID_"^"_CreateDate_"^"_CreateTime_"^"_RepNo_"^"_PatNo_"^"_PatName_"^"_Creator_"^"_LocDesc_"^"_statusname_"^"_Typeevent_"^"_TypeCode_"^"_shareStatus_"^"_armaID_"^^"_TypeeventDr_"^"_Typeevent_"^"_StatusNow_"^"_StatusNext .. ..S Num=Num+1 ..S ^TMP("DHCADV","web.DHCADVSEARCHREPORT","GetMataReport",pid,Num)=ListData . .//输血报告 .F S ID=$o(^DHCBLDADVRPT(0,"CreateDate",dd,ID)) Q:ID="" D ..S TypeeventDr=$p(^DHCBLDADVRPT(ID),"^",47) ..q:+TypeeventDr=0 ..S TypeCode="",Typeevent="",statusname="",armaID="",StatusNow="" ..S TypeCode=$p(^DHCMEDADREVT(TypeeventDr),"^",1) ..S Typeevent=$p(^DHCMEDADREVT(TypeeventDr),"^",2) ..S:TypeeventDr'="" armaID=$o(^DHCADVREPMAN(0,"TyepPointer",TypeeventDr,ID,"")) //评估id 2017-06-12 ..S StatusID=$p(^DHCBLDADVRPT(ID),"^",46) //当前状态 ..;q:+StatusID=0 ..I StatusID="" D ...S status="N" ...S statusname="未提交" ..E D ...S status="Y" ...S statusname=$p(^DHCADREVTWFI(+StatusID,"ADREWI",$p(StatusID,"||",2)),"^",2) ...s StatusNow=statusname ...S MedadrID=$o(^DHCMEDREPADT(0,"Pointer",TypeeventDr,ID,""),-1) ...I MedadrID'="" D ....S MedadrReceive=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MedadrID),"^",9) ....S MedadrReceivedesc=$S(MedadrReceive="":"",MedadrReceive="1":"接收",MedadrReceive="2":"驳回",MedadrReceive="3":"直接提交",1:"") ....I MedadrReceivedesc'="" S statusname=statusname_"："_MedadrReceivedesc

..;不良事件报告日期和时间取报告第一次提交的时间 add by wangminglong 2019-7-9 start ..;S RepDate=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(RepID),"^",4) ..;S CreateTime=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(RepID),"^",5) //报告 时间 ..s MEDADRRowID="" ..s flag="0" ..for S MEDADRRowID=$o(^DHCMEDREPADT(0,"Pointer",TypeeventDr,advdrID,MEDADRRowID)) q:(MEDADRRowID="")||(flag="1") d //审批明细表的id ...S StatusDR=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MEDADRRowID),"^",3) //状态 ...Q:StatusDR="" ...s flag="1" ...S CreateDate=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MEDADRRowID),"^",5) //第一次提交日期 即报告 日期 ...S CreateTime=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MEDADRRowID),"^",6) //第一次提交日期 即报告 日期 ...S:CreateDate'="" CreateDate=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateLogicalToHtml(CreateDate) ...s:CreateTime'="" CreateTime = $zt(CreateTime) ..;不良事件报告日期和时间取报告第一次提交的时间 add by wangminglong 2019-7-9 end
..S ListData=advdrID_"^"_CreateDate_"^"_CreateTime_"^"_RepNo_"^"_PatNo_"^"_PatName_"^"_Creator_"^"_LocDesc_"^"_statusname_"^"_Typeevent_"^"_TypeCode_"^"_shareStatus_"^"_armaID_"^^"_TypeeventDr_"^"_Typeevent_"^"_StatusNow_"^"_StatusNext ..S Num=Num+1 ..S ^TMP("DHCADV","web.DHCADVSEARCHREPORT","GetMataReport",pid,Num)=ListData . .//新版不良事件从此处往下添加 .//投诉 .s RepID="" .f s RepID=$o(^DHCADVMASTER(0,"RepDate",dd,RepID)) q:RepID="" d ..S RepTypeCode="",RepTypeDr="",RepType="",RepStaus="",RepUser="",RepLoc="",RepSubType="",RepImpFlag="",MedadrReceive="未接收",MedadrReceivedr="",armaID="",MedadrReceivedr="" ..S recordID=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(RepID),"^",1) ..Q:recordID="" ..S RepTypeDr=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(RepID),"^",2) ..S:RepTypeDr'="" RepTypeCode=$p(^DHCMEDADREVT(RepTypeDr),"^",1) ..S:RepTypeDr'="" RepType=$p(^DHCMEDADREVT(RepTypeDr),"^",2) ..S:RepTypeDr'="" armaID=$o(^DHCADVREPMAN(0,"TyepPointer",RepTypeDr,RepID,"")) //评估id 2017-06-12 ..s SupRepType="" ..s:RepTypeCode["adv" SupRepType="护理不良事件" ..s:RepTypeCode'["adv" SupRepType=RepType ..S RepStausDr=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(RepID),"^",3) ..s StatusNow="" //当报告是为提交状态时当前状态应该是空 add by wangminglong 2019-5-28 ..;q:+RepStausDr=0 //过滤错误数据 qqa 2018-01-01 ..I RepStausDr="" D ...S RepStaus="未提交" ...S status="N" ..E D ...S status="Y" ... ...S RepStaus=$p(^DHCADREVTWFI(+RepStausDr,"ADREWI",$p(RepStausDr,"||",2)),"^",2) ...s StatusNow=RepStaus ...S MedadrID=$o(^DHCMEDREPADT(0,"Pointer",RepTypeDr,RepID,""),-1) ;b ...I MedadrID'="" D ....S MedadrReceivedr=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MedadrID),"^",9) ....S MedadrReceive=$S(MedadrReceivedr="":"",MedadrReceivedr="1":"接收",MedadrReceivedr="2":"驳回",MedadrReceivedr="3":"直接提交",1:"") ....S:(MedadrReceive'="")&&(status="Y") RepStaus=RepStaus_"："_MedadrReceive ....
..S RepTime=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(RepID),"^",5) ..S RepUserDr=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(RepID),"^",6) ..S:RepUserDr'="" RepUser=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",RepUserDr),"^",2) ..S RepLocDr=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(RepID),"^",7) ..S:RepLocDr'="" RepLoc=$p(^CTLOC(RepLocDr),"^",2) ..S:RepLoc["-" RepLoc=$p(RepLoc,"-",2) ..S RepSubType=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(RepID),"^",8) ..S RepImpFlag=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(RepID),"^",9) ..S RepLevel=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(RepID),"^",12) ///不良事件级别 ..S RepInjSev=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(RepID),"^",13) ///伤害严重度 ..S PatName=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(RepID),"^",17) //病人姓名 ..S PatID=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(RepID),"^",20) //登记号 ..S RepList=RepTypeDr_"^"_RepLocDr_"^"_RepUserDr_"^"_RepID ..S flag=##class(web.DHCADVSEARCHREPORT).CheckQuerySec(RepList,list) ..S RepShareStatus="未分享" ..Q:RepTypeDr="" ..Q:RepID="" ..S rshShare=$o(^DHCADVRSH(0,"TypePointer",RepTypeDr,RepID,"")) ..I rshShare'="" D ...S RepShareStatus="分享" ..S Listt=RepID_"^"_RepTypeDr_"^"_list ..S matalast=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).InsStatusLast(Listt) ..S StatusLastID=$p(matalast,"^",2) //上一状态 ..S StatusLast="" ..I StatusLastID'="" D ...S AdrewRowIDnLast=$p(StatusLastID,"||",1) ...S AdrewChildSubnLast=$p(StatusLastID,"||",2) ...S StatusLast=$p(^DHCADREVTWFI(AdrewRowIDnLast,"ADREWI",AdrewChildSubnLast),"^",2)
..//下一状态 add by wangminglong 2019-4-23 start ..S Listt=RepID_"^"_RepTypeDr_"^"_list_"^"_RepStausDr ..S matalast=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).InsStatusDr(Listt) ..S StatusNextID=$p(matalast,"^",2) //下一状态 ..S StatusNext="" ..I StatusNextID'="" D ...S AdrewRowIDn=$p(StatusNextID,"||",1) ...S AdrewChildSubn=$p(StatusNextID,"||",2) ...S StatusNext=$p(^DHCADREVTWFI(AdrewRowIDn,"ADREWI",AdrewChildSubn),"^",2) ..//下一状态 add by wangminglong 2019-4-23 end
..Q:flag'=1 ..//登录科室是品质安全部(130),医务、护理、设备、后勤保障、输血、院感、药学、企划,能查到所有不良事件 add by wangminglong 2019-7-29 start ..s LocFlag=0 ..i ((DeptID="130")||(DeptID="122")||(DeptID="127")||(DeptID="129")||(DeptID="138")||(DeptID="107")||(DeptID="128")||(DeptID="82")||(DeptID="139")) s LocFlag=1 ..Q:(LocFlag'=1)&(DeptID'="")&(DeptID'=RepLocDr) ..//登录科室是品质安全部(130),医务、护理、设备、后勤保障、输血、院感、药学、企划,能查到所有不良事件 add by wangminglong 2019-7-29 end ..Q:(StatType'="")&(StatType'=status) ..Q:(patNo'="")&(patNo'=PatID) ..Q:(typeevent'="")&(typeevent'=RepTypeDr)&(RepTypeCode'["adv") ///这里如果是护理不良事件也不应过滤 ..;s ^qqa("typeevent")=typeevent ..Q:((typeevent'="")&(typeevent'=RepTypeDr))&&((RepTypeCode["adv")&(typeevent'=87)) ..Q:(statShare'="")&(statShare'=RepShareStatus) ..b ;err ..;Q:RepNo="" ..;编号为空、
..;不良事件报告日期和时间取报告第一次提交的时间 add by wangminglong 2019-7-9 start ..;S RepDate=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(RepID),"^",4) ..;S CreateTime=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(RepID),"^",5) //报告 时间 ..s MEDADRRowID="" ..s flag="0" ..for S MEDADRRowID=$o(^DHCMEDREPADT(0,"Pointer",RepTypeDr,RepID,MEDADRRowID)) q:(MEDADRRowID="")||(flag="1") d //审批明细表的id ...S StatusDR=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MEDADRRowID),"^",3) //状态 ...Q:StatusDR="" ...s flag="1" ...S RepDate=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MEDADRRowID),"^",5) //第一次提交日期 即报告 日期 ...S CreateTime=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(MEDADRRowID),"^",6) //第一次提交日期 即报告 日期 ...S:RepDate'="" RepDate=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateLogicalToHtml(RepDate) ...s:CreateTime'="" CreateTime = $zt(CreateTime) ..;不良事件报告日期和时间取报告第一次提交的时间 add by wangminglong 2019-7-9 end
..S ListData=RepID_"^"_RepDate_"^"_CreateTime_"^^"_PatID_"^"_PatName_"^"_RepUser_"^"_RepLoc_"^"_RepStaus_"^"_SupRepType_"^"_RepTypeCode_"^"_RepShareStatus_"^"_armaID_"^"_recordID_"^"_RepTypeDr_"^"_RepType_"^"_StatusNow_"^"_StatusNext
..S Num=Num+1 ..S ^TMP("DHCADV","web.DHCADVSEARCHREPORT","GetMataReport",pid,Num)=ListData
S maxrow=Num I EndPage>maxrow S EndPage=maxrow S quitflag=0 w ##class(web.DHCADVJSONCOMMON).getJsonStartSign(Num) //输出json前缀串 S Num=0 S index="" F S index=$o(^TMP("DHCADV","web.DHCADVSEARCHREPORT","GetMataReport",pid,index),-1) Q:(index="")||(quitflag=1) D //wangxuejian 2016-10-09 逆向进行取值 .S mdata=^TMP("DHCADV","web.DHCADVSEARCHREPORT","GetMataReport",pid,index) .S Title="ID^CreateDate^CreateTime^RepNo^PatNo^PatName^Creator^LocDesc^status^Typeevent^TypeCode^RepShareFlag^Assess^recordID^RepTypeDr^TypeSon^StatusNow^StatuNext" .S Num=Num+1 .Q:Num<StPage .S:Num=EndPage quitflag=1 .I Num=StPage D ..W ##class(web.DHCADVJSONCOMMON).getJsonData(Title,mdata) .E D ..W ","_##class(web.DHCADVJSONCOMMON).getJsonData(Title,mdata)
W ##class(web.DHCADVJSONCOMMON).getJsonEndSign() //输出json结尾符 D ..killTmpGlobal(pid) Q ""

Method.Implementation: n (RecordID) s Ret="" s:Ret="" Ret = ##class(web.DHCADVCOMMONPRINT).GetRecordItmData(RecordID,"","nurseReportType-95239") s:Ret="" Ret = ##class(web.DHCADVCOMMONPRINT).GetRecordItmData(RecordID,"","nurseReportType-95251") s:Ret="" Ret = ##class(web.DHCADVCOMMONPRINT).GetRecordItmData(RecordID,"","nurseReportType-95261") s:Ret="" Ret = ##class(web.DHCADVCOMMONPRINT).GetRecordItmData(RecordID,"","nurseReportType-95271") s:Ret="" Ret = ##class(web.DHCADVCOMMONPRINT).GetRecordItmData(RecordID,"","nurseReportType-95277") s:Ret="" Ret = ##class(web.DHCADVCOMMONPRINT).GetRecordItmData(RecordID,"","nurseReportType-95280") q Ret

Method.name: getRecordId
Method.Implementation: n (Id) s recordId=0 q:$g(Id)="" 0 s recordId=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(Id),"^",1) q recordId

Method.name: GetPortInfo
Method.Description: Creator:qqa Description:护理不良事件通过主表ID获取信息
Method.Implementation: n (Id) q:+Id=0 "" s RecordId=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(Id),"^",1) s RepTypeID=$p(^DHCADVMASTER(Id),"^",2) q RecordId_"^"_RepTypeID

Method.name: SaveReplex
Method.Description: 保存-回复信息 add by wangminglong 2019-7-22 start W ##class(web.DHCADVSEARCHREPORT).SaveReplex(medadrList)
Method.Implementation: N (medadrList) s ^tempwml("SaveReplex")=$lb(medadrList) s reportId=$p(medadrList,"^",1) s typeCode=$p(medadrList,"^",2) s replyMess=$p(medadrList,"^",3) s userId=$p(medadrList,"^",4) s locId=$p(medadrList,"^",5) s groupId=$p(medadrList,"^",6) s reptypeDr=$p(medadrList,"^",7) s file="" s filerowId=$o(^DHCADVFILE(0,"RepDrType",reportId,reptypeDr,"")) i filerowId'="" s file=$p(^DHCADVFILE(filerowId),"^",3) i ((reportId="")||(userId="")||(locId="")||(groupId="")||(file="Y")) d .s ListData="-1^回复失败" .i file="Y" s ListData="-1^已归档不能回复" e d .s ^DHCReplex("Replex",reportId,locId,groupId,userId)=replyMess_"^"_+$h_"^"_$p($h,",",2) .s ListData="0^回复成功" s ListTitle="ErrCode^ErrMsg" w ##class(web.DHCADVJSONCOMMON).getJsonData(ListTitle,ListData) q ""

Method.name: RevokeReplex
Method.Description: 撤销-回复信息 add by wangminglong 2019-7-22 start W ##class(web.DHCADVSEARCHREPORT).RevokeReplex(medadrList)
Method.Implementation: N (medadrList) s ^tempwml("RevokeReplex")=$lb(medadrList) s reportId=$p(medadrList,"^",1) s typeCode=$p(medadrList,"^",2) s userId=$p(medadrList,"^",3) s locId=$p(medadrList,"^",4) s groupId=$p(medadrList,"^",5) s reptypeDr=$p(medadrList,"^",6) s file="" s filerowId=$o(^DHCADVFILE(0,"RepDrType",reportId,reptypeDr,"")) i filerowId'="" s file=$p(^DHCADVFILE(filerowId),"^",3) i ((reportId="")||(userId="")||(locId="")||(groupId="")||(file="Y")) d .s ListData="-1^撤销失败" .i file="Y" s ListData="-1^已归档不能撤销" e d .k ^DHCReplex("Replex",reportId,locId,groupId,userId) .s ListData="0^撤销成功" s ListTitle="ErrCode^ErrMsg" w ##class(web.DHCADVJSONCOMMON).getJsonData(ListTitle,ListData) q ""

Method.Description: 查询-回复信息 add by wangminglong 2019-7-22 start w ##class(web.DHCADVSEARCHREPORT).QueryReplyLocUser(rows,page,params)
